snippet.title: My Beautiful Paper Smile Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
My Beautiful Paper Smile is a psychological horror game following the story of a child trapped in a facility that raises children to be perfect. Their utmost joy is required at all times. They must smile always, never frowning; always happy, never saddened.  Coming to Steam Early Access Summer 2020.

Wishlist on Steam Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1036700/My_Beautiful_Paper_Smile/
Website:www.mybeautifulpapersmile.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MBPSmile
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyBeautifulPaperSmile/
